column2: while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic. See: ChatGPT Temperature in FAQs.

column1: (*) Select the product attributes in the attribute box below to give ChatGPT some input to generate content. The selected attributes will be put in curly brackets {{ }} and separated by a semicolon ; in the prompt box.
